confirmCheckbox: I understand the risks and want to export my private key
copyWarning:
Click the eye button to reveal your private key. Make sure no one is around you.
If you copy it to clipboard, remember to clear your clipboard afterwards to prevent leakage.
funderNotice: Note: Your funds are stored in the Funder Address (a Gnosis Safe contract), not the wallet address derived from this private key. The Funder Address is a smart contract controlled by your private key. If you import this key into a cryptocurrency wallet, you'll see a different address and won't find your assets there. To access your funds, {connectToPolymarket} and use the {withdraw} feature.
title: Export Private Key
warningDetail: Never share your private key with anyone. Anyone with access to your private key can steal all assets in your wallet.
